## Summary
- What changed?
- Why?

## Validation
- [ ] `npm run lint` (or equivalent)
- [ ] `npm run typecheck` (or equivalent)
- [ ] `npm test` (or equivalent)
- [ ] Docs/README updated (if behavior changed)

## Release Notes
- [ ] `feat:` user-facing feature
- [ ] `fix:` bug fix
- [ ] `docs:` documentation-only
- [ ] `chore:` maintenance/internal
